review: I bought the Fire stick believing it would be the solution to obtaining all of the streaming providers in one fail swoop. I already owned a Chrome Cast so, I was able to stream Hulu, Youtube, Netflix but was missing Amazon Instant streaming. The fire stick allowed me to access all subscriptions.  I was excited and then... I was let down, every show I watched would loose quality and freeze but the sound would continue. My bandwidth is fine, everyone in the house wasn't using the internet at the time, and my husband is a software engineer for a cable company so we have the top of the line of internet service.  I never had this problem with my Chrome cast and have since went back to using it along with my x box for amazon prime instant streaming.  I'm disappointed and makes me a very sad panda.
